data.max_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response
data.rag_api: Enable the RAG API. RAG_API_OUTPUT between two curly braces will be replaced by the RAG API results.
data.rag_api_url: The URL to send RAG requests to.
data.rag_api_authentication: Whether to authenticate to the RAG API.
data.log_all_prompts: Log all prompts in an external server (you probably want this disabled)
data.data_logger_url: If prompts are logged, input URL to send POST requests to.
data.service_authorization: Check authorization before calling services (you probably want this disabled)
